title: The Shadow & the Blood Assassin
description: She had a new life.Hidden behind a different name in a faraway land, she believed that she'd never have to follow the dark passage again.She thought the past was dead.Until suddenly her peaceful and uneventful life is threatened forcing her to act to protect not only herself but something far more precious.For her that was well worth any risk.But to act is to reveal yourself and that’s a dangerous thing for an assassin her old mentor used to say. Cause after you’ve come out into the light anyone can see you and everything you’ve hidden, even your deepest secrets, could be revealed.this is the sequel to The Ghost of the Cazador
author: Angelo Tsanatelis
